job.title: Data Engineer (AWS/PySpark)
job.description: <p><strong>Job Title:: Data Engineer (AWS/PySpark)</strong></p><p><strong> Job Location:: Malvern, PA</strong></p><p><strong>Job Type:: Full time</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Must have - AWS cloud platform using PySpark on EMR Glue ETL </strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p>1 Experience in building large scale batch and data pipelines with data processing frameworks in AWS cloud platform using PySpark on EMR Glue ETL </p><p>2 Deep experience in developing data processing data manipulation tasks using &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;such as reading data from external sources merge data perform data enrichment and load in to target data destinations </p><p>3 Proficiency with Big Data processing technologies Hadoop Hive or Databricks </p><p>4 Experience in deployment and operationalizing the code using CI CD tools Bitbucket and Bamboo </p><p>5 Experience with SQL and relational databases </p><p>6 Strong AWS cloud computing experience Extensive experience in Lambda S3 EMR Redshift</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
